page.title: 02Services Ardfern (Craignish)
page.content: Water. Mains water (from a hill loch) to all but one of the houses with in the N.W. section of the block (but not far beyond, where house holders rely on their own private supply from springs, burns or lochs). Electricity. All dwellings now have mains electricity but due to frequent power failures most householders have alternative cooking, heating & light- ing equipment. Sewerage.New planning applicants are required to install septic tanks but raw sewage still goes into the loch! Roads. (No pavements/ street lights). Heavier traffic = roads need regular upkeep. (Heavy rain can cause blocked culverts, then flooding!) Refuse. Weekly collection. Police/Ambulance/Fire Brigade. All 15 miles away. But village 'volunteer' firemen on (24 hour) call.
